name: SnackBar
description:
Snackbars provide brief notifications.
Snackbars inform users of a process that an app has performed or will perform. They appear temporarily, towards the corner of the screen. They shouldn't interrupt the user experience, and they don't require user input to disappear.

properties.name: actionContent
properties.label: Action Button Content
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set the text of the action button.

properties.name: snackContent
properties.label: Snackbar Content
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set the text of the snackbar.

properties.name: type
properties.label: Type
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set the type of the snackbar.  There are 5 types of snack bars: "info", "success", "warning", "error" or empty.

eventHandlers.name: onClose
eventHandlers.label: onClose Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks on the close button.

eventHandlers.name: onAction
eventHandlers.label: onAction Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks on the action button.
